attributes.title: F**kface Postponed due to Weather
attributes.description: Due to the severe weather in Austin, this week's F**kface episode is postponed but will be out as soon as possible. In the meantime, Andrew Panton wanted to give a quick word so people weren't left with nothing.

attributes.title: F**kface Breaks Sh*t
attributes.description: Geoff has gathered co-hosts Gavin Free & Andrew Raymond Somer Panton, along with Superfan Jack Pattillo, to participate in the ultimate box break of trading cards. Will they break even? Will they make money? Probably not. This is F**kface Breaks Shi*t.

attributes.title: F**kface Breaks Sh*t Again
attributes.description: Geoff has gathered co-hosts Gavin Free & Andrew Raymond Somer Panton, along with Producer Eric, to participate in the ultimate box break of trading cards. Will they break even? Will they make money? Probably not. This is F**kface Breaks Shi*t... Again.

attributes.title: F**kface Breaks Sh*t 4 // Live Card Opening Box Break
attributes.description: Geoff has gathered co-host Andrew Raymond Somer Panton & Producer Eric Baudour to open more packs of cards LIVE. Will they find anything good? Is there a Zimmer? This is F**kface Breaks Sh*t.

attributes.title: F**kface Breaks Shit // Card Openings & Breaks 10/01/21
attributes.description: Join Geoff, Gavin, Andrew, and Producer Eric to open some new card packs. Also meet Geoff’s girlfriend and resident Barbie Expert Emily as she walks the guys through some curated Barbie outfits and Barbie cards.

attributes.title: Cosmic Crisp Review - Official Regulation Season 2 Supplemental Episode 1
attributes.description: Join Geoff, Gavin, Producer Eric, and Sound Engineer Nick as they taste test the Cosmic Crisp apple! Andrew is also here but he did not taste test the apple and believes this is all a prank being pulled on him. It's not, it's a Cosmic Crisp apple tasting and it's real. Is it a good? How'd they like them apples?

attributes.title: A Q&A with Andrew
attributes.description: In this special presentation, Andrew takes some time out to answer questions from the F**kface Regulation Listeners and Comment Leavers. This isn't a regulation episode, just a supplemental piece that we wanted to try out for you. Hope you enjoy.

attributes.title: F**kface Breaks Sh*t // Card Pack Openings // December 10, 2021
attributes.description: Geoff Ramsey, Gavin Free, Andrew Panton, producer Eric, and Emily are back to open cards and hopefully find a Zim. Gavin's been promoted, Geoff hits it big, and the gang figure out the groan stick goes weooooohhhww.

attributes.title: A Q&A with Andrew #2
attributes.description: Andrew is back to take questions from the F**kface Regulation Listeners and Comment Leavers. Andrew gets behind the scenes on some bits and clears up misconceptions, particularly about Raymond Somer.

attributes.title: F**kface Watch Along: The Tuxedo
attributes.description:
Join Geoff, Gavin, Andrew, Eric, and Nick for this F**kface watch along of the 2002 hit Jackie Chan movie The Tuxedo. A hapless chauffeur must take a comatose Secret Agent's place using his special gadget-laden tuxedo.
To watch along, cue up The Tuxedo (available on DVD and HBO Max) and wait for the countdown. When you hear the cue, hit play. Now you're watching The Tuxedo.

attributes.title: F**kface Breaks Shit // Card Openings and Breaks 2/9/2022
attributes.description: Geoff gets the gang together (minus Gavin) to break open some new packs in this February edition of Breaks Shit. Where is …fan Jack? Did Geoff make his money back? Did we pronounce all these hockey names right?

attributes.title: Eric's Job - Supplemental
attributes.description: You are joining us 25 minutes into a scheduling conversation where Eric is attempting to schedule upcoming F**kface recordings and events. This is not recorded for content, this is all genuine conversation that our audio engineer Nick rolled on just in case. Here is a slice of what it is like to be the producer for this podcast. Enjoy.

attributes.title: F**kface Breaks Shit // Card Openings and Breaks 3/25/2022
attributes.description: Back in their familiar digs, Geoff gathers Gavin, Andrew, Soundboard Emily, and Producer Eric to break some new packs and discover what's inside. With not a Zim in sight, how will the F**kface Crew fare in this card opening

attributes.title: Geoff at the Plate
attributes.description:
Oh, somewhere in this favoured land the sun is shining bright,
The band is playing somewhere, and somewhere hearts are light;
And somewhere men are laughing, and somewhere children shout,
But there is no joy in F**kville—mighty Geoffy has struck out.

attributes.title: Geoff at the Plate *REAL*
attributes.description:
The sneer is gone from Geoffy's lip, his teeth are clenched in hate,
He pounds with cruel violence his bat upon the plate;
And now the pitcher holds the ball, and now he lets it go,
And now the air is shattered by the force of Geoffy's blow.

attributes.title: F**KFACE Breaks Sh*t
attributes.description: Geoff Ramsey and Eric Baudour participate in the ultimate box break of trading cards. Will they break even? Will they make money? Probably not. This is F**kface Breaks Shi*t.

attributes.title: F**kface Breaks Sh*t 6/21/2022
attributes.description: Geoff and Eric are back to open card packs and see if they get a Zim. In this episode, we reveal that Garfield has died, there’s a Vancouver Child Kicker stamp, some awesome mail, if these Game of Thrones cards are real, and more.

attributes.title: The Beanhole
attributes.description: After a long day of baseball, the only thing that could satiate you is beans from a hole. The F**kface boys took the time to dig a hole, light a fire, make some beans, then come back and dig up the beans. Chow down on the most delicious content you've ever seen

attributes.title: Geoff Hits Baseballs (The Gavin Cut)
attributes.description: Behold the ultimate Gavin cut of Geoff hitting the F**kface baseballs. Witness everything there was to see on the day Geoff shocked the world. A true behind the scenes look at auteurs in action.

attributes.title: The Tuxedo Auction
attributes.description: Join Andrew as he live bids on the tuxedo from The Tuxedo. What bids must he overcome? Is anyone going to swoop in and prevent this purchase? Why does Andrew have access to the credit card? Find out answers to all this and more as we try to buy a piece of cinema history.

attributes.title: F**kface Breaks Shit // Card Openings and Breaks 8/17/2022
attributes.description: Geoff, Emily, and Producer Eric are back to open card packs and see if they get a Zim. In this episode, we break open some mail, have a Savanna Bananas drink, feed the pack sack, go through Geoff's open playlist, go through Spring Break cards, and more.

attributes.title: F**kface Breaks Shit // Card Openings and Breaks 9/28/2022
attributes.description: Geoff Ramsey, Jack Pattillo and Eric Baudour participate in the ultimate box break of trading cards. Will they break even? Will they make money? Probably not. This is F**kface Breaks Shi*t.

attributes.title: Alpha-Bet Prejudgement with Andrew, Eric, and Nick
attributes.description: LISTEN TO THIS WEEK'S EPISODE BEFORE LISTENING TO THIS - Did he Greg it? After pulling the numbers, Andrew realizes his video mistake and calls upon Eric & Nick to see what kind of trouble he may be in. In this short clip, Eric & Nick go over the evidence and determine how they think Gavin & Geoff will react to Andrew's ball troubles.

attributes.title: Survive Block Island: Meltdown Retrospective with Gavin & Andrew
attributes.description:
*SPOILERS AHEAD* WATCH SURVIVE BLOCK ISLAND: MELTDOWN BEFORE LISTENING!
Now that Survive Block Island: Meltdown is wrapped up, Geoff sits down with Gavin & Andrew to dig into their experiences on the show and all the supposed betrayal everyone assumed. What was it like behind the scenes and how was it being trapped on an island together, virtually. Everything talked about here is a spoiler for Survive Block Island: Meltdown which people will say "How was I supposed to know there were spoilers" but like imagine you do that. Come on.

attributes.title: Andrew's MVP 2 Powerpoint
attributes.description: Get your banana wipes ready, here is your primer for MVP 2 as presented by Andrew Panton.

attributes.title: F**kface Watchalong: MVP 2
attributes.description:
The wait is over - it's time to watch the monkey movie, MVP 2. Is it a hockey movie? Is it a skateboarding movie? Is Louie the real star? Watchalong with the F**kface team and witness the movie that is MVP 2: Most Vertical Primate. 

Download the audio version https://bit.ly/3H81Pas

attributes.title: Pizza Day
attributes.description: WATCH THE VIDEO VERSION if you can. From Geoff’s house with a pizza oven, it’s a F*kface pizza day. Witness the creation of the Ploughman’s Pizza. Geoff and Eric create pepperoni pizzas but is there sabotage on Gavin? This is part one of a two part Pizza Day saga. Video versions on Rooster Teeth and on Youtube.

attributes.title: Eating the Ploughman’s Pizza
attributes.description:
WATCH THE VIDEO VERSION if you can. Now that the pizzas are done, it time to dig in. Join the whole crew as they break down their pizza adventure and determine if these pizzas belong in a cookbook. Andrew even gets in on the Pizza Day action. Video versions on Rooster Teeth and on Youtube.
Download the audio version https://bit.ly/3HoQ1Ri

attributes.title: Our Favorites of 2022
attributes.description: Join the F**kface crew along with Producer Eric & Engineer Nick as they get together on an office day and talk about their favorite things of 2022. A nice little year end wrap up to the year and the things everyone appreciated. What were you thankful for this year? Let us know.

attributes.title: F**kface Falls Draft
attributes.description:
Geoff, Gavin, Andrew, Producer Eric, and Audio Engineer Nick get together to snake draft all falls from the entirety of human history. Enjoy a big big argument at the top where Eric is right and everyone said he was crazy and now they don't get it. It's something. If you want to see the falls, visit the link below. Who had the best draft? Leave a comment, comment leaver.
==SPOILERS== Here is the COMPLETED draft list: https://bit.ly/FFfallsDraftFinal ==SPOILERS==

attributes.title: Sausage Talk 2
attributes.description: In their second office day, Geoff, Gavin, Andrew, Producer Eric, and Audio Engineer Nick get together to talk about bits that have been dropped through the history of the show, scheduling bits, the cosmic crisp care package, and the Best of F**kface.

attributes.title: F**kface Sloppy Joes Bingo
attributes.description: Eyes down. It's time to grab your dabber and watch some Sloppy Joes Bingo along with the F**kface crew. Each member has their own bingo card and its a race to see who Bingos first. Witness a dead parrot head, keep your eyes peeled for a pink taxi, and ask yourself "why are these kids out so late?" Because this is our first attempt at Sloppy Joes Bingo. Let us know in the comments if we should do this live.

attributes.title: F**kface Rock Not Rock Draft
attributes.description: F**kface is back with another draft, this time the pool is all things that are rocks but not rocks. In this contentious draft you can see how your own list stacks up against the F**kface crews. In what round was Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson taken? You gotta listen to find out.

attributes.title: F**kface Watchalong: Condorman
attributes.description:
“Woody, you're a great cartoonist, and you're a great comic book writer - but you're a lousy bird.”
Prepare for takeoff as F**kface brings you a new watchalong, this time with the 1981 "classic" Condorman. Cartoonist Woody becomes the superhero he draws. Using his gadgets he helps a Soviet spy defect to the West.
Watch along with Geoff, Gavin, Andrew, Eric, and Nick to unlock the mysteries that are Condorman.

attributes.title: F**kface Mall Draft
attributes.description: Attention Shoppers, the F**kface crew is back with another draft, this time they’re drafting the best mall. What stores will land a coveted spot in each mall? 4 rounds of a snake draft start now. Where are you shopping?

attributes.title: F**kface Sloppy Joe's Bingo (Sleepover Stream)
attributes.description: It's Slop O'Clock and the F**kface crew is here for some bingo. Join Andrew, Nick, Eric, Geoff, and Gavin (ANEGG) as they finally play Sloppy Joe's Bingo live with YOU! We worked with our friend Guvkon (Twitter @guvkon) to make an official Sloppy Joe's Bingo card for tonight! Grab your bingo card here: https://fkface-bingo.pages.dev/

attributes.title: F**kface Blindside
attributes.description: ???? Watch along here: https://youtu.be/UO4UNFlOc8w

attributes.title: Break Show: Blind Box Gurpler Live Shopping Event
attributes.description:
IF YOU'RE WATCHING THIS, THIS IS NO LONGER ON SALE.
Geoff and Eric are back to open some packs and find a Zim? Maybe? It’s blind box gurpler time. Get gurpl’d. Find golden gurpler for ultimate gurpling surprise.

attributes.title: F**kface Ads Draft
attributes.description: The F**kface crew is back with a new draft: Ads from our Childhood. The pool is ads and it was Gavin's idea. We highly recommend you watch the video version of this one so you can see the ads but they are commercials so it's up to you. The Ads Draft starts now!

attributes.title: F**kface State Draft
attributes.description: The F**kface crew is back with another draft, this time they're drafting States. It was Eric's idea and what do you think Andrew is going to do? Finally a finite pool to draft from, you would think. Who won?

attributes.title: Sausage Talk 3
attributes.description: It's a new Sausage Talk. Join Geoff, Gavin, Andrew, Producer Eric, and Audio Engineer Nick as they get together to talk about merch, an addendum to the merch, who works for who, Geoff's new podcast, and now we have the website.

attributes.title: Summer of 98 Movies Top 10
attributes.description: Geoff, Gavin, Andrew, Producer Eric, and Nick get together to talk through the Top 10 movies of the Summer of 98 and we're not leaving until we've settled it. Andrew has compiled the list, everyone chooses 3, and that's where the battle begins. What is your Summer of 98 Top 10 movies? Is Snake Eyes on it?

attributes.title: Ultimate Playlist of 98
attributes.description:
To put a wrap on the Summer of 98, Geoff, Gavin, Andrew, Producer Eric, and Nick get together to make the Ultimate Playlist for 1998. In a round robin selection, the crew builds a list of their favorite songs of 98 to put together one playlist. It's back to back jams as we take your summer out with a bang. 
You can listen to the Ultimate Playlist of 98 on Spotify here: https://open.spotify.com/playlist/2n5nxHO2auQPS6nvabXww1?si=d9ac386d7842482e

attributes.title: Surströmming Nose Flaps Test
attributes.description: Geoff has declared that he can close his “nose flaps” at will to block out smells. The rest of the F**kface crew wants to put it to a test by locking him in the portapotty with an open can of Surströmming, Sweden’s notoriously stinky delicacy. Does Geoff have what it takes or will his nose flaps fail him in his time of need?

attributes.title: Crisps
attributes.description:
The long awaited Crisps ranking is here. Geoff, Gavin, and Andrew have selected 4 (four) of their nation's greatest crisps (chips) to go head to head in a taste test. Join Geoff, Gavin, Andrew, Eric, Nick, Graysie, and special guest Becca as crisps are crunched. What's a nik nok?
*~* CRISP CHOICE SPOILER*~*
Gavin:
Pickled onion monster munch
Frazzles
nice n spicy nik naks
Twiglets
Geoff:
Ruffles Queso
Kettle Jalapeno
Zapps Mesquite BBQ
Zapps New Orleans Style Voodoo
Andrew:
Lays Ketchup
Hawkins Cheezies
Ruffles All Dressed
Old Dutch BBQ

attributes.title: Sloppy Joes Bingo 9/29/23
attributes.description:
It's Slop O'Clock and the F**kface crew is here for some bingo. Join Andrew, Nick, Eric, Geoff, and Gavin (ANEGG) as they finally play Sloppy Joe's Bingo live with YOU, this time they'll be using the OFFICIAL Sloppy Joe's Bingo cards from the box that is on sale TONIGHT at store.roosterteeth.com
Grab your bingo card here: https://fkface-bingo.pages.dev/ Thanks to our friend Guvkon (Twitter @guvkon) for making the Bingo Card Generator site.
We're also taking over Let's Play https://www.youtube.com/@Letsplay starting 10/6 and launching F**kface Off for FIRST members on 10/9.
If you want to support this show directly, you can sign up at http://fuckfacepod.com/first NOW

attributes.title: Andrew's Blindside
attributes.description:
It's been a while but a new Blindside has emerged. With the gang gathering under the pretense of watching a cool Tony Hawk Pro Skater video, Andrew Blindsides everyone into watching Canadian television series The Littlest Hobo. Andrew's got that dog in him.

It's been a while but a new Blindside has emerged. With the gang gathering under the pretense of watching a cool Tony Hawk Pro Skater video, Andrew Blindsides everyone into watching Canadian television series The Littlest Hobo. Andrew's got that dog in him.



Watch the episode here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ujvzAdvdS7A

attributes.title: Bean Hole 2 The Jackhammering
attributes.description:
Geoff, Gavin, Eric, and Nick get together in Geoff's backyard to dig another bean hole and collect some dirt for the Bean Hole Dirt Pens. They have rented a jack hammer. Do they need a jack hammer? Do they know how to use a jack hammer? Should they be allowed to do this? Grab a shovel and a powertool because its time to dig.

Want to own THIS DIRT? Grab a pen: https://store.roosterteeth.com/products/f-kface-bean-hole-pen

attributes.title: Xmas Movie Draft
attributes.description: Just hear the sleigh bells jingling as ANEGG get together for a new draft, this time picking the greatest Xmas movies of all time. Is the number 1 pick TRULY number 1? What would your draft board look like? You watching these? Don't bother putting the cookies out for Santa because F**kface is bringing the goods this year.

attributes.title: Xmas Music Draft
attributes.description:
Rockin around the F**kface tree this year is AN EGG as they pick their favorite holiday tunes. Is music the reason for the season? Is a snack draft important for picking here? 
Want to listen to the whole playlist? Check it out here but SPOILERS it has all the songs on it: https://open.spotify.com/playlist/64wNuttWuzeunT00CHG0MZ?si=9f5191f0d68d42da

attributes.title: Beanie Prototype Test Fitting
attributes.description: We just got the extended beanie prototypes so we needed to try them out. Enjoy.

attributes.title: Christmas Catalog of 98
attributes.description: AN EGG round out the holidays with a walk down memory lane as they go through a Christmas catalog from 1998. Flip the pages with us and check out what was Hot or Not for the 98 holiday. Whoa is that PlayStation?

attributes.title: Geoff & Gavin Get Waxed
attributes.description:
Gavin said this would feel good so now Geoff & Gavin are getting waxed. We also got great footage for our new video opening. Who do you think had it worse? Do you think it felt good?
Thanks for Elyse from Friends Forever ATX for helping us and waxing these hairy guys.

attributes.title: Fruit Throw
attributes.description: Which fruit do you think you could throw the furthest? The long awaited arrival is here. It’s the fruit throw video. Pick a fruit and chuck it.

attributes.title: Fruit Throw Commentary with Andrew and TPG
attributes.description: You may have seen the true fruit throw video but now watch it with behind the scenes, never before heard commentary from Andrew Panton and Tim G. Are you a fruit guy? Have a watch and marvel at these tosses.

attributes.title: Gavin and Andrew’s Nugget Buddy Watch Along
attributes.description: In an attempt to secure his final two nugget buddies Andrew mailed a crate of buds for Geoff to open during the break show. Does nugget paranoia get the best of Gavin & Andrew? Does Andrew secure his missing Kerwin & Darla? Watch along with us!

attributes.title: The Desks
attributes.description: Gavin claims that if you stack desks, the top desk will be move faster than the bottom desk. Graysie does not agree. We finally put it to the test with a surprise 3 desk test.

attributes.title: Silly Straw Drink Race
attributes.description:
We are gathered here today because we decided now is the time to drink a whole can of soda through the F**kface silly straw, a real straw that works. Gavin and Geoff have their safety equipment on because safety first and now the race is on. Who can drink it down? Is that Michael on a Onewheel?
Grab your own silly straw bundle here and get suckin https://store.roosterteeth.com/products/f-kface-silly-straw-bundle

attributes.title: An Announcement
attributes.description:
An announcement for the ages.

https://store.roosterteeth.com/products/letsplay-officially-licensed-ratyboy-heavyweight-t-shirt

attributes.title: Did We Do?
attributes.description: Recorded February of 2023, listen as the guys talk through what they wanted to do for Does It Do and determine if they should? Go rewatch all of Does It Do now while there's time. Did we do? Maybe we did. You could too.
